oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.partition

Class PartitioningUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.partition.PartitioningUtils

  • public class PartitioningUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides miscellaneous utility functions for working with partitions.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

                                    Configuration conf)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes a partitioning result and returns all contained partitions indexed in an r-tree
        Parameters:
        pr - partitioning result
        spatialOpConf - if provided, the indexed partitions geometries are optimized for the spatial operation
        conf - a job's configuration
        Returns:
